
# Fireball PSP 
![fireballpsp](https://static.openfintech.io/vendors/fireballpsp/logo.svg?w=400&c=v0.59.26#w200)  

## General 
 
**Code:** `fireballpsp` 
 
**Name:** 
 
:	[EN] Fireball PSP 
 
**Status:** `active` 
 
**Description:** 
 
: [EN]  BEST PRICES. Fireball is the cheapest PSP on the market of online payments. Thanks to our daily monitoring of all rates offered by the acquiring banks worldwide , we can always offer you the best conditions for your various online payment methods. This will easily save you 15 % on your costs for online payments. Your transaction volume increases along with the growth of your company. Thanks to our daily monitoring of the best rates on the market, we can guarantee that your costs per transaction will decrease significantly. Handle many payments online? Please contact us for a more detailed analysis of your payment traffic and the associated costs .SECURITY AT BANKING LEVEL. Unfortunately fraud is a constant reality. Fireball will support you to accept payments from your customers in a secure manner . Fireball’s’s internal risk offering includes more than 120 risk checks, easily configured within our user interface.  
 
 
**Countries:** 
 
:	![AU](https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/flag-icon-css/3.3.0/flags/4x3/au.svg#w24) 	![BE](https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/flag-icon-css/3.3.0/flags/4x3/be.svg#w24) 	![FR](https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/flag-icon-css/3.3.0/flags/4x3/fr.svg#w24) 	![DE](https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/flag-icon-css/3.3.0/flags/4x3/de.svg#w24) 	![NL](https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/flag-icon-css/3.3.0/flags/4x3/nl.svg#w24) 	![ES](https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/flag-icon-css/3.3.0/flags/4x3/es.svg#w24) 	![CH](https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/flag-icon-css/3.3.0/flags/4x3/ch.svg#w24) 	![AE](https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/flag-icon-css/3.3.0/flags/4x3/ae.svg#w24)  
**Contacts:**
